headline: WTW appoints Farah Ismail Senior Director, Head of Commercial Lines within its Insurance Consulting & Technology business
summary: NEW YORK, June 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking, and solutions company, has announced the appointment of Farah Ismail as Senior Director, Head of Commercial Lines within its Insurance Consulting and Technology (ICT) business in North America. Farah brings more than fifteen years of experience across a wide spectrum of commercial insurance lines, including both specialty (Excess & Surplus Lines, Cyber, Healthcare, Environmental, Directors & Office

headline: 4 Stocks to Watch From the Prospering Insurance Brokerage Industry
summary: The increased demand for insurance products, strategic acquisitions and the adoption of technology should drive the performance of Zacks Insurance Brokerage industry players like ERIE, BRO, MMC, AJG and WTW.
